basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Highly skilled and versatile Software Engineer with experience in full-stack development, AI/Machine Learning, and DevOps practices. Passionate about building robust, scalable applications from conception to deployment.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Collaborated as a core member of a small development team to build the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform.
highlights: Architected and developed key dashboard and form components for campaign management
Implemented responsive design principles and ensured cross-browser compatibility
Worked closely with the back-end team on system design and API integration

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led the frontend refactoring of an exam management platform and developed an AI-powered browser extension.
highlights: Improved user experience and page load times by refactoring the frontend
Engineered and deployed an AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking

projects.name: Otis
highlights: Automated form-filling and email generation for customer support

projects.name: IT-Hub
